title: Ricochet and Impact Sound Effects
description: Cinematic Ricochet and Impact Sound Effects
longDescription:
Cinematic Quality Sound Effects

Recorded remotely with Hollywood level equipment - this is the Ricochet and Impact Sound Effects Pack from GameAssetsOnline.


Featuring rich Ricochet Sound Effects for projectiles deflecting off a surface as well as dirty Impact Sound Effects for Rocks and Dirt (hard hitting and reflection sounds).


Mastered in 44100Hz, 16bit Mono WAV format for optimal quality.
technicalDetails:
Features: 

 Ricochet Sound Effects for projectiles deflecting off a surface.

 Impact Sound Effects for Rocks and Dirt (hard hitting and reflection sounds)



Number of Audio Waves: 105

Number of Audio Cues: 105

Sample rate / bit rate: 44100Hz, 16bit Mono WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Yes and can be quickly repeated through a variation/randomisation filter in Unreal Engine.

Minutes of audio provided: 1 min 35 secs (totalled from all short ricochets and impacts)

Supported Development Platforms: PC, PS4, PS4 Pro, Xbox One, Xbox One X, Nintendo Switch.

Supported Target Build Platforms: PC, PS4, PS4 Pro, Xbox One, Xbox One X, Nintendo Switch.

Documentation: Read here

Important/Additional Notes: To achieve the most realistic sound possible, try to layer and randomise these sounds on playback.
